Package estgconstroi

Interface Team

public interface Team

Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão (ESTG) | Politécnico do Porto (PP)
Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática (LEI) e Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores (LSIRC)
Paradigmas de Programação (PP) - 2021/2022

The Team interface provides the methods for an team.

    • setLeader

      void setLeader(Employee employee) throws TeamException
      Sets the team's leader
      Parameters:
      employee - The employee should be a EmployeeType.TEAM_LEADER team leader
      Throws:
      TeamException - if employee is not a EmployeeType.TEAM_LEADER team leader

      Parameters:

      Throws:

      Parameters:
      employee - the employee to be removed
      Throws:
      TeamException - if the employee is not in the team
